author: Simon Difford
description: Two diverse rums combine brilliantly in this classic sour.
name: Dino Sour
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
